alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 27 at 2:55AM MDT until October 27 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as the mid to upper 20s. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front, Salt Lake Valley and Utah Valley. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
